definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: These repetitive and necessary alterations can only be realized by the original designer.
sentences.chinese: 這些重複但必要的改動只能由原設計師來實現。

sentences.english: We adjusted the formula, but not by much.
sentences.chinese: 我們最終調整了分配方案，但改動不大。

sentences.english: You can essentially make large changes without having to rewrite several tests.
sentences.chinese: 你可以做很大的改動，基本上不需要重寫一些測試。

sentences.english: The faculty committee ruled that changes in the curriculum should be implemented.
sentences.chinese: 校務委員會決定課程的改動必須得到執行。

sentences.english: Once you set this value for a table, you cannot change it.
sentences.chinese: 當爲一個表設置了這個值後，就不能再改動了。

sentences.english: Pin tucks across the pattern at the alteration places.
sentences.chinese: 用大頭針在紙樣需改動的地方打襉。

sentences.english: But as long as we do _not_ know the "Why" of it, we will have to revert.
sentences.chinese: 只要我們不知道，那麼我們就不得和回滾整個改動。

sentences.english: Then he asked to reword one point — to change one word.
sentences.chinese: 然後他要求改動一個詞。

sentences.english: OptiWinders are configured and manufactured according to the customer's specific requirement.
sentences.chinese: 歐普卷布機可以根據客戶的特殊要求進行設計和改動。

sentences.english: With slight modification this kind of polarizing microscope can be used as gem microscope.
sentences.chinese: 只要稍加改動這種偏光顯微鏡便可以用做寶石顯微鏡。

sentences.english: When you do this exercise, make changes in the sentence structure when (if) nece ary.
sentences.chinese: 做這個練習時，必要時可以改動句子結構。

sentences.english: Some slight changes were made in the temps and then taken to the ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 在臨時貼面與製作到瓷貼面的過程中有輕微的改動。

sentences.english: Lish edited that book too, but lightly.
sentences.chinese: 理什也編輯了此書，但只做了少量改動。

sentences.english: The main alteration that will be made is the implementation of a delayed autoresponder.
sentences.chinese: 主要的改動將要進行的是一個自動應答延遲實施。

sentences.english: So, main does have to change a tiny bit.
No changes in text of librettos.

definition: to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
